title: VR-Based Mathematics Online Lecture Design and Operational Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic online learning platforms and foundational theories of mathematics education
context.additional_context: Enhancing competencies in designing and operating visualization of mathematical concepts using simulation tools in VR environments.

learning_goals: Learners can describe instructional design principles for effectively delivering math concepts (simulations/3D modeling) in VR environments.
Learners can develop one or more VR-based math lecture modules integrating formative assessments (quizzes, feedback loops).
Learners can apply technical optimization strategies to ensure VR content accessibility in BYOD environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
